page.title: 11CHILDREN'S CHOICES
page.content: During June 1985 the children at the Sproatley Village School, who are aged between 5 and 11 years of age, were interviewed for their opinions on a variety of subjects. Each child was asked 10 questions and the results are shown below. Favourite Pop Group........{WHAM!} Favourite Sports..FOOTBALL & NETBALL Favourite Animal........{HORSE} Favourite Colour..........{RED { }Favourite T.V.Programme....{DALLAS} Favourite Food..........FISH & CHIPS Favourite Hobby.....{HORSE RIDING} Favourite Lesson.........{P.E.&GAMES { Favourite Sweets......'COLA BOTTLES' { }Country that they would most like to visit................{SPAIN & U.S.A.
